actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 44 of title 18 of the United States Code, to limit the availability of guns not suitable for lawful sporting purposes.

summary.text: Makes it unlawful for any person to knowingly import or bring into the United States any part of a firearm. Makes it unlawful for any licensed importer, licensed manufacturer, licensed dealer, or licensed collector to sell or deliver any firearm which is not suitable for sporting purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 44 of title 18 of the United States Code, to limit the availability of guns not suitable for lawful sporting purposes.
